title: Are public Google docs indexed by Google? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes they can be indexed.  Simply click on the Share button then select "anyone can find and view" For example: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1UXtxHgFYzKEVWkccrK12kiuybgrfBafPAxVv_TvuxK8/edit?usp=sharing  You can see the people viewing the doc at the top right hand side.

Here's an easy test that proves the answer is "yes." Open an incognito tab, and do a search like this: common passwords site:drive.google.com. Currently, this is showing search results for both folders and docs.
